function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 pandemic impacting vacation behavior","Impact":"Significant drop in tourist numbers and air transportation use","Mitigation":"Developing specific measures to restore travelers' certainty and encourage vacation behavior","Technologies":"Health and safety protocols, communication technologies for guidance and updates","People":"Tourists, travelers","Owner":"Tourism organizations, travel companies"},{"Description":"External risk factors (e.g., border closures) affecting travel behavior","Impact":"Altering all types of travel behavior","Mitigation":"Monitoring and addressing external risk factors, providing guidance and support for travelers","Technologies":"Travel advisories, border control technologies","People":"Travelers, government agencies","Owner":"Government agencies, travel authorities"},{"Description":"Internal risk factors (e.g., risk perception, anxiety) affecting vacation behavior","Impact":"Affecting some forms of vacation behavior","Mitigation":"Implementing behavior-specific approaches, addressing risk perception and anxiety, providing support for affected individuals","Technologies":"Mental health support technologies, communication platforms for counseling","People":"Travelers, vacation planners","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals"}]}
